name: bunrise
description: lightweight and flexible front-end library based on Bun.js for modern web apps

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:jsx-runtime && bun run build:jsx-dev-runtime && bun run build:bunrise && bun run build:cli
scripts.build:jsx-runtime: bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=jsx-runtime packages/jsx-runtime/index.ts && cp types/index.d.ts jsx-runtime/index.d.ts
scripts.build:jsx-dev-runtime: bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=jsx-dev-runtime packages/jsx-runtime/index.ts && cp types/index.d.ts jsx-dev-runtime/index.d.ts
scripts.build:cli: bun run build:cli:build && bun run build:cli:start && bun run build:cli:dev
scripts.release:alpha: bun run build && npm publish --tag next && bun run clean
